title.value: Analytical parameters of home-produced ELISA-chloramphenicol kit based on the results of the veterinary laboratory tests
Аналитические параметры отечественного набора реагентов 'ИФА-ХЛОРАМФЕНИКОЛ' по результатам испытаний в ветеринарных лабораториях

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Poznyak, T.A., Belarus State Veterinary Center, Minsk (Belarus)
Rusinovich, A.A., Belarus State Veterinary Center, Minsk (Belarus)
Vashkevich, I.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of Bioorganic Chemistry
Sviridov, O.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of Bioorganic Chemistry

abstract.value: Тhе trials of home-produced enzyme immunoassay kit for quantitative determination of chloramphenicol in foodstuffs of animal origin have been carried out in the three organizations of the Ministry of agriculture and food of Belarus. The investigation of the specimens of 6 kinds of products has shown that а detection limit and quantification limit of antibiotic determination vary from 0,05 to 0,1 ррb and from 0,1 to 0,2 ррb respectively (minimal required performance limit – 0,3 ррb), chloramphenicol recovery is greater than 75 %, while repeatability and reproducibility are characterized bу average values of coefficient of variation of 8 and 13 % respectively. It was concluded that the technical level, analytical parameters and exploitation characteristics of the home-produced kit correspond to that of imported analogs and саn replace them in screening studies оn а safety control of foodstuffs of animal origin.
